channel.title: NEW-Last chapter- Flawless old school [ 24/7 VPS] [ HIGHSCORES] [AMAZING ECONOMY
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastchapterimg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lchail1.jpg[/img]
Last Chapter is inspired by the amazing memories from Runescape in 2006, we started out a few months back and have come so far. We are not claiming to be perfect or to have 100% perfected everything like every other server out there but what we have accomplished is another story, here are some pictures to give you a grasp of what we have keeping in mind these are not nearly all the features but some of our favourites. We simply want to make the players happy so it's not us who make the server its you! Feel free to come join the community!
Thanks, [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/ownercrown.png[/img] Nathan,dan and jody. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Website:[url=http://www.last-chapter.org]Last Chapter[/url] Webclient: [url=http://last-chapter.org/webclient/?hires.x=79&hires.y=71&plugin=0][size=36pt]Play Now[/size][/url] Features: [COLOR="Lime"]90% combat mage and range following map fully clipped and npcs all skills working godswords and skillcapes with emotes added due to requests. oldschool webclient donator area well organised area with alot of npcs and bosses AND ALOT MORE COME AND CHECK IT OUT, HERES SOME PICS && a video of the combat/bridding:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3F6IXyyQZ8I&list=PL0BEC7B1669F9944D&feature=plcp[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KAsDdnA3WrE&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
Some media:
[IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lcpkd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/onetwothree.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lcchaosele.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lcdueling.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lcadvertise501.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lcadvertise502.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv10.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv11.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lastadv12.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/lcad5.jpg[/img][url=http://last-chapter.org]Last Chapter[/url]
